title: Golf: Rolling Ball
instructions:
A golf ball is sitting on the course. Your job is to roll it into the hole!

You have one function:
- `move_ball_right()` moves the ball one unit to the right

The ball needs to move **20 times** to reach the hole. Call `move_ball_right()` enough times to get it there!
hints: Each call to move_ball_right() moves the ball one step
You need to call move_ball_right() exactly 20 times
Just write move_ball_right() on 20 separate lines
